definition: to continue/to proceed with/to go on with
to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards

sentences.english: For Saliou, the work in the mines goes on.
sentences.chinese: 对Saliou来说，矿山的工作还要继续。

sentences.english: The RCMP said its investigation is continuing.
sentences.chinese: 皇家骑警称调查正在继续。

sentences.english: And, of course, the research into pain continues.
sentences.chinese: 当然，对痛苦的研究仍在继续。

sentences.english: Americans continue to debate how to interpret the Second Amendment.
sentences.chinese: 美国人为如何解释第二修正案继续辩论。

sentences.english: And yet, the writing life continues to capture its victims.
sentences.chinese: 但是，写作的生活将继续捕捉爱好它的“落网之鱼”。

sentences.english: In the intensive care unit, beam aunt continue to talk to her mother that year.
sentences.chinese: 重症病房里，梁大妈继续跟马母说着当年的事。

sentences.english: And maybe they continue to improve their arsenals.
sentences.chinese: 也许他们会继续改进其核武库。

sentences.english: The Chinese government has demanded that U.S.-led NATO bear all responsibilities for this incident, and the Chinese side will continue to pay close attention to the development of the matter.
sentences.chinese: 中方将继续密切关注情况的发展。

sentences.english: May God bless the grieving families, and may God continue to bless America.
sentences.chinese: 愿神保佑他们悲恸的家人，愿神继续保佑美国。

sentences.english: At present, hospitals continue to operate on a fee-per-service model.
sentences.chinese: 目前，医院继续采取服务收费的运作模式。

sentences.english: Only few States continue to maintain a separate chancery court.
sentences.chinese: 只有少数几个州继续保持独立的衡平法院。

sentences.english: "And also this affair must be discreet, " Kugelmass continued.
sentences.chinese: “然后同样这次外遇必须保密，”库马思继续。

sentences.english: Piscine mouth shoe, afterwards follow on current goes this year, if show, toe is like concealed, very sexy.
sentences.chinese: 鱼嘴鞋，今年继续流行，脚趾若隐若现，十分性感。

sentences.english: And then you go forward on that basis.
sentences.chinese: 承认了错误，才能继续前进。

sentences.english: Please resume your seats, as the performance will continue in two minutes.
sentences.chinese: 请回到你们的座位上，表演两分钟后将继续进行。

sentences.english: We continued our select coastal journey in Fujian, which boasts scenic beauty and a brilliant cultural tradition.
sentences.chinese: 我们在风光秀美，文化灿烂的福建继续海疆精华之旅。

definition: again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
to go down/to descend/to go on/to continue/(of a servant) to withdraw
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
straight (in a straight line)/continuously/always/from the beginning of ... up to .../all along
